    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client()
       throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor is used to decide what kind of client is made. A human or a computer. Here the Server adress can also be defined and the host port.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is used from the extension of Thread. It runs the client and if something goes wrong it shuts it down.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • readString

        public void readString(java.lang.String msg)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       ServerClientDisaggreeException
        This is the most important method in the class. It received input from the ClientHandler and translates it to actions or moves. This method follows the BIT Group 2 Protocol. For every incoming message there is an answer. And if not it just prints it out.
        Parameters:
        msg - the String received from the ClientHandler
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ServerClientDisaggreeException

      • addScores

        public void addScores(java.lang.String[] scoreInput)

      • doStartGame

        public void doStartGame()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method asks for input from the client when he wants to start a game. The Client has to type "Y" to start a game
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • placeTiles

        public void placeTiles(Move move)
        Places the moves on your own board
        Parameters:
        move - the move that is going to be placed

      • placeTiles

        public void placeTiles(java.util.ArrayList<Move> moves)
        Sets the received ArrayList moves into the board. Also checks if it's valid or not.
        Parameters:
        moves - the moves to be placed on the board

      • receiveTiles

        public void receiveTiles(Tile tile)
        Adds the received Tile into the hand of this Client.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile to be added into the hand

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove()
        This method checks if its a TradeMove or a placed move. Trades the moves if its a TradeMove

      • swapMove

        public void swapMove(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> tiles)
        Sends a message to the ClientHandler with the tiles you want to be swapped out of your hand.
        Parameters:
        tiles - the tiles you want to be swapped

      • placeMove

        public void placeMove(java.util.ArrayList<Move> moves)
        Places the moves on a board. Also checks if it's the first move or not Also sends messages to the ClientHandler about the moves to be placed
        Parameters:
        moves - the moves you want to place

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
